summary: This is an email chain from September 2019 between an Assistant United States Attorney (AUSA) and a colleague regarding scheduling for interviews related to the Epstein investigation. The AUSA invites the colleague to attend an interview on Tuesday and mentions another interview on Friday.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, inviting a colleague to interviews related to the Epstein investigation and providing their office contact information.

events.title: Epstein Investigation Interview
events.description: An interview relating to the Epstein investigation scheduled for 12:30 PM.

events.title: Inmate Interview for Epstein Investigation
events.description: Another interview of an inmate relating to the Epstein investigation scheduled for 12:00 PM.

locations: United States Attorney's Office Southern District of New York, One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The email confirms active investigation activities related to Jeffrey Epstein were ongoing in September 2019, after his death in August 2019.
The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was scheduling interviews, including one with an inmate, as part of the Epstein investigation.
The correspondence shows coordination between federal prosecutors regarding attendance at investigative interviews.
The document is part of a series (EFTA00039983 and EFTA00039984 are referenced).
